text: Siemianowice Śląskie (; ) is a city in Silesian Voivodeship in south Poland, near Katowice. In 2021, 65,684 people lived there and its area is 25.5 km². It is on the Brynica river. In 1924, Siemianowice and Huta Laury communes were merged. It has had city rights since 1932. Category:Cities in Silesian Voivodeship
title: Siemianowice Śląskie
